price: 5. Waxay yidhaahdeen: Quluubtayadu waa ka daboolan yihiin waxaad noogu yeedhi (Islaamka), waxaana ah culeys dhegahayaga, daah baana xidhan dhexdeenna innaga iyo adiga, ee camal falo; innaguna sidoo kale waanu camal falan3.
arabic: وَقَالُواْ قُلُوبُنَا فِيٓ أَكِنَّةٖ مِّمَّا تَدۡعُونَآ إِلَيۡهِ وَفِيٓ ءَاذَانِنَا وَقۡرٞ وَمِنۢ بَيۡنِنَا وَبَيۡنِكَ حِجَابٞ فَٱعۡمَلۡ إِنَّنَا عَٰمِلُونَ
footnotes: 3. U shaqeeya diintiinna, innaguna waynu u shaqeyn.

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: waqālū qulūbunā fī akinnatin mimmā tadʿūnā ilayhi wafī ādhāninā waqrun wamin bayninā wabaynika ḥijābun fa-iʿ'mal innanā ʿāmilūna
